tasks.title: Fix Telegram voice messaging
tasks.description: Voice messages currently crash OpenClaw. Need to investigate and fix the crash issue to make voice messaging stable and reliable.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Root cause: OOM killer terminating gateway when whisper loads model. Server has 3.8GB RAM, no swap. Fix: switched to tiny model (73MB vs 139MB base). Config updated and gateway restarted.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Voice message test successful! Received and transcribed without crash. Tiny model fix confirmed working.

tasks.title: Fix Voice Message Gateway Crashes
tasks.description: After 2-3 voice messages, gateway becomes unresponsive and requires restart. Investigate memory/context issues with voice message processing. CRITICAL PRIORITY.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Updated OpenClaw from 2026.1.30 to 2026.2.2-3. This version includes fix #7475 'Media understanding: skip binary media from file text extraction' which should address the voice message context overflow issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Stability test in progress: 6/10 voice messages processed successfully with no crashes. Update to 2026.2.2-3 appears to have fixed the issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: STABILITY TEST PASSED: 10/10 voice messages processed successfully including a 2.5 minute stress test. Update to 2026.2.2-3 confirmed to fix the binary media context overflow issue. Ready for final approval.

tasks.title: Activity Monitor Research & Improvement

Deliverables: Comprehensive PDF report + voice summary under 2 min.

tasks.title: Activity Monitor: Agent Chats Tab

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Anthony feedback: Needs redesign. Current layout not right. Requirements: (1) Main session on RIGHT, sub-agent on LEFT like text messages (2) Vertical rectangular cards like the Active Agents view - one card per sub-agent conversation (3) Newest messages at BOTTOM, scrollable history (4) Show main↔sub-agent dialogue, not user↔assistant. Spawning sub-agent to fix.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Redesign complete. Card-based grid layout matching Active Agents. iMessage-style bubbles (main=right/purple, sub-agent=left/gray). Newest at bottom with scroll. API now returns sender: main/sub-agent. Service restarted.

tasks.title: Agent Chats: Live Status Indicators
tasks.description: Add live/dead status indicators to Agent Chats page: (1) Green indicator for live agents (still active, not expired) (2) Red indicator for dead/expired agents (3) Sort conversations by most recent message - newest at top/left (4) Match active status with Active Agents view threshold timer

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Complete. Added isLive field to API (10-min threshold matching Active Agents). Green pulsing dot for live, red for dead. Status badges. Sorted by most recent first. Service restarted.

tasks.title: Main Session as Manager - Identity File Tuning
tasks.description: Update HEARTBEAT.md, SOUL.md, AGENTS.md to enforce: (1) Main session DELEGATES, never does tasks manually (2) Cruel boss mentality - demand results, no excuses, kill stuck agents (3) Always available to respond to Anthony (4) Mission Control sync every heartbeat (5) Skill creation awareness - suggest skills for repeatable patterns

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Updated all 3 identity files: HEARTBEAT.md (manager mindset, cruel boss supervision, skill awareness), SOUL.md (delegation-first identity, skill-first thinking), AGENTS.md (hierarchy diagram, main session supervision rules). Committed and pushed.

tasks.title: DCOP Equations Research - 5T OTA & Miller Op Amp
tasks.description: Research DC operating point steady-state equations for CMOS op-amp design. Focus on 5T OTA and Miller op-amp topologies. Find equations using Cadence ADE DCOP parameters (gm, rout, Cgs, etc.) to accurately predict: Gain, Bandwidth, GBW, CMRR, PSRR, Noise, Input/Output Range, Input/Output Impedance, Power, and other key metrics. Must gather 25+ sources (textbooks, papers, journals, blogs). Deliverable: Comprehensive list of equations for each topology with sources cited.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-015-dcop-equations' with Opus. Session: agent:main:subagent:335638a8-f84a-4f6f-b07e-81683df6f918. Researching 25+ sources for DCOP equations.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent completed too quickly (44s) and didn't produce PDF. Rate limits hit on web search. Respawning with adjusted approach.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Completed. Created dcop_equations_report.md (898 lines) and PDF. Covers 13 metrics for 5T OTA, 15 metrics for Miller op-amp. Includes Cadence parameter mappings and source citations (Razavi, Gray-Meyer, Allen-Holberg, Johns-Martin).

tasks.title: DCOP Equations V2 - 100 Sources, Constrained Parameters
tasks.description: Deep research with 100 sources for DCOP equations. MUST use only Cadence Spectre parameters from Anthony's file. Top 10 metrics: Gain, BW, GBW, Noise, CMRR, PSRR, Input Range, Output Range, Input Impedance, Output Impedance. For both 5T OTA and Miller op-amp. Deliverable: PDF with summary table at top (metric + topology + equation), then massive appendix with sources, derivations, explanations.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-016-dcop-100-sources' with Opus. 30-min timeout. Researching 100 sources, constrained to exact Cadence parameters Anthony provided.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent failed - GitHub Copilot token expired mid-research (96 entries in transcript). Respawning...

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Completed. Created dcop_equations_v2.md (953 lines, 30KB) and PDF (99KB). 100 sources cited. All equations use only Cadence Spectre DCOP parameters. Summary table at top, detailed appendix with derivations, full source list.

tasks.title: IC Amplifier Knowledge Base - Biomedical/Chopper Focus
tasks.description: Massive deep research on IC amplifier topologies for biomedical/neural applications. Focus: 5T OTA, Miller op-amp, Fully Differential OTAs, Chopper amplifiers for EEG/biopotential. Constrained to Cadence DCOP parameters. Requirements: 200+ sources, design methodology, topology pros/cons, metric prediction equations, low-power techniques. Build comprehensive Obsidian knowledge base.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-017-ic-amp-research' with Opus. 1-hour timeout. Building comprehensive Obsidian knowledge base: 200+ sources, 10+ topologies, biomedical/chopper focus, all DCOP equations.

comments.author: Anthony
comments.text: Focus areas clarified: 1) Fully differential amplifiers for chopper/EEG/neural 2) CMFB circuits and design methodology. Will respawn research sub-agent when rate limit clears.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: First sub-agent completed but output minimal (4 files, 142 lines). Used GPT-4o fallback. Respawning for comprehensive 200+ source research.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Multiple sub-agent attempts failing to produce substantial output. Current state: 4 files, 142 lines total. Sub-agents hit source access blocks (403s) and terminate early. Awaiting direction - options: 1) keep retrying with adjusted approach, 2) wait for better API availability, 3) break into smaller incremental tasks.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Analyzing sub-agent failures: 1) GPT-4o hit 64k token limit accumulating fetched content 2) 403 blocks on MDPI/ResearchGate 3) Strategy shift needed - will break into smaller incremental tasks (one file per sub-agent) to avoid context overflow and accumulate knowledge incrementally.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Recovery strategy: Breaking into incremental sub-tasks. Will spawn focused sub-agents to expand ONE file at a time (target: 150-200 lines each). Starting with FDOTA.md using PMC/arXiv sources (accessible). Goal: accumulate knowledge incrementally instead of one massive research dump.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Context management active. Guiding sub-agent task-017-deep-research via sessions_send. Current progress: 4 files in ic-amplifier-kb/, Low-Noise-EEG-Chopper.md expanded to 91 lines. Sub-agent context at 29% - healthy. Continuing incremental expansion with streaming-to-file pattern.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Progress: 433 lines total (was 156). FDOTA file expanded to 281 lines. CMFB expansion sub-agent spawned. Using small-task pattern (one file per agent) to avoid context overflow.

comments.author: OpenClaw
